Float Geeks http://www.floatgeeks.io en-us ℗ & © , Connor Knabe Float Geeks a podcast about everyting related to the float industry. The Float Geeks The Float Geeks podcast dives deep into the float tank industry. We talk about how to setup a float tank, customizing the filtration system, what happens in the tank, research about the health benefits of the tank, and much more.
